title: How do I view a web page in full screen or save a web page to bookmarks?
answer:
To view a web page in full screen, on the browser screen, touch Menu then Full screen. 

 [To save a web page to bookmarks, on the browser screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109577) on the left of the address box, and touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109578).]()
